AUG/2022 - Till Date
Kumara Mahesh Babu Malisetti
Greenville, SC -29607
+1 864 567 0550 | maheshbabumalisetti@gmail.com
Professional Summary
Accomplished Tableau Administrator and Developer with 8+ years of experience managing Tableau
Server environments, architecting advanced business intelligence solutions, delivering over 150
interactive dashboards across finance, healthcare, and retail sectors. Expert in Tableau Desktop,
Server, and Prep, with proficiency in SQL, Python, and data warehousing. Recognized for boosting
organizational efficiency by 35% through optimized visualizations and predictive analytics. Exposure to
Alteryx for data preparation workflows with a strong ability to ramp up. Tableau Desktop Specialist and
Analytics Professional, skilled in leading cross-functional teams, mentoring analysts, and driving data-
driven strategies. Adept at translating complex datasets into compelling, actionable insights for C-level
stakeholders.
